definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
clenbuterol hydrochloride (diet pill that burns fat)/e.g. Spiropent
pinyin: yan2 suan1 ke4 lun2 te4 luo1

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the in vivo distribution of tramadol hydrochloride in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察盐酸曲马多在大鼠体内的分布及其特点。

sentences.english: HPLC method for the determination of stachydrine hydrochloride in Yimucao tablets was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了HPLC法测定益母草片中盐酸水苏碱的含量。

sentences.english: Objective To carry out a research on curative effect of Trazodone Hydrochloride on ejaculation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨早泄患者使用盐酸曲唑酮治疗的效果。

sentences.english: In the second group Benidipine, Hydrochloride was used for 6 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 各小组分别用生理盐水或盐酸贝尼地平灌胃6周。

sentences.english: The renaturation of polyphenol oxidase from Tobacco denatured in 6 0 mol/L guanidine hydrochloride(GdnHCl) was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了盐酸胍变性烟草多酚氧化酶后的复性。

sentences.english: A classical method to determine the content of cinnamaldehyde is called hydrochloride hydroxylamine—pyridine oximation.
sentences.chinese: 探讨一种无吡啶盐酸羟胺肟化法测定肉桂醛的可行性。

sentences.english: The drug clenbuterol is not used in the treatment of pigs.
sentences.chinese: 盐酸克仑特罗这种药物在猪只并没有治疗用途。

sentences.english: Take up the residue in 2 quantities, each of 5 ml, of dilute hydrochloric acid R.
sentences.chinese: 将供试品炽灼残渣分成两份，每份加入5ml稀盐酸。

sentences.english: The results of pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of lidocaine carbonate were compared with those of lidocaine hydrochloride.
sentences.chinese: 将药代动力学及药效学研究结果与其盐酸盐进行比较。

sentences.english: Results The cumulative penetration amount of dihydroetorphine hydrochloride was linearly related to time.
sentences.chinese: 结果盐酸二氢埃托啡累计渗透药量与时间呈线性关系。

sentences.english: Zinc metal reacts with hydrochloric acid to produce bubbles of hydrogen gas and zinc chloride.
sentences.chinese: 金属锌与盐酸反应产生氢气泡和氯化锌。

sentences.english: HPLC method is developed for the determination of cetirizine hydrochloride capsules.
sentences.chinese: 用高效液相色谱法测定盐酸西替利嗪胶囊的含量。

sentences.english: Double-point potentiometric titration was used to determine ranitidine hydrochloride and its capsules.
sentences.chinese: 采用酸碱双点电位滴定法测定盐酸雷尼替丁含量。

sentences.english: Objective To study the quality standard of levofloxacin hydrochloride gel.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立盐酸左氧氟沙星凝胶质量标准。

sentences.english: The treatment group was treated with routine resuscitation therapy plus naloxone hydrochloride.
sentences.chinese: 治疗组在常规猝死复苏的基础上加用盐酸纳络酮。

sentences.english: "Sanded star of third of hydrochloric acid annulus piece " what disease does this medicine basically treat?
sentences.chinese: “盐酸环丙沙星片”这个药主要治什么病的？
